item.title: JSON Web Token in Java using Auth0 Java JWT Library
item.description: Introduction In this Java tutorial, we learn how to work with JSON Web Token (JWT) in Java application using the Auth0â€™s Java JWT library. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); How to add Java JWT Library to your Java project To use the Java JWT library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. implementation 'com.auth0:java-jwt:3.14.0' To use the Java JWT library in the Maven build project, add the following dependency into the pom.
